description.zh-cn: 一项旨在通过快速发现、追踪、隔离和治疗病例以彻底切断传播链，从而应对传染病（特别是严重特殊传染性肺炎）的防疫政策。
description.en: An epidemic prevention policy aimed at responding to infectious diseases (especially COVID-19) by completely cutting off transmission chains through rapid detection, tracing, isolation, and treatment of cases.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的主要政治、经济和文化区域，不包括香港、澳门和台湾。
description.en: The main political, economic, and cultural area of the People's Republic of China, excluding Hong Kong, Macau, and Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 2022年底在中国大陆各地爆发的反对清零政策和封锁措施的抗议活动。
description.en: Protests that erupted across mainland China in late 2022 against the zero-COVID policy and lockdown measures.

zh-cn: 关于进一步优化落实新冠肺炎疫情防控措施的通知

description.zh-cn: 中国国务院联防联控机制于2022年12月7日发布的通知，大幅放宽了疫情防控措施，标志着清零政策的实际终结。
description.en: A notice issued by the Joint Prevention and Control Mechanism of the State Council of China on December 7, 2022, which significantly relaxed epidemic control measures, marking the de facto end of the zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: 联合国系统内国际卫生问题的指导和协调机构。
description.en: The directing and coordinating authority for international health matters within the United Nations system.

description.zh-cn: 埃塞俄比亚政治家和学者，自2017年起担任世界卫生组织总干事。
description.en: Ethiopian politician and academic who has been Director-General of the World Health Organization since 2017.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国国务院副总理。
description.en: Chinese politician who served as a Vice Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 2022年贵州省三都县客车侧翻事故

zh-cn: 2022年贵州省三都县客车侧翻事故

description.zh-cn: 2022年9月18日，一辆载有隔离转运人员的客车在中国贵州省发生侧翻，造成27人死亡的重大事故。
description.en: On September 18, 2022, a bus carrying individuals for quarantine transfer overturned in Guizhou Province, China, causing a major accident with 27 fatalities.

description.zh-cn: 一种应对2019冠状病毒病疫情的公共卫生策略，旨在将病毒视为地方性流行病，并逐步恢复社会正常活动，而不是试图完全消灭病毒。
description.en: A public health strategy for managing the COVID-19 pandemic that aims to treat the virus as an endemic disease and gradually resume normal societal activities rather than attempting to completely eliminate the virus.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently serving as the Chairman of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中共中央政治局委员、广东省委书记。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently a member of the Politburo of the CCP Central Committee and the Party Secretary of Guangdong.

description.zh-cn: 中国外交官，曾任中华人民共和国外交部发言人。
description.en: Chinese diplomat who served as a spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国记者，曾任《环球时报》总编辑。
description.en: Chinese journalist and former editor-in-chief of the Global Times.

nodes.id: 严重急性呼吸道症候群冠状病毒2型Omicron变异株

zh-cn: 严重急性呼吸道症候群冠状病毒2型Omicron变异株

description.zh-cn: 一种高传染性的SARS-CoV-2变异株，其广泛传播对全球疫情形势和防控策略产生了重大影响。
description.en: A highly transmissible variant of SARS-CoV-2 whose widespread transmission has had a significant impact on the global pandemic situation and control strategies.

en: Crime of obstructing the prevention of infectious diseases

description.zh-cn: 中国《刑法》规定的一项罪名，适用于违反传染病防治法规定，拒绝执行卫生防疫机构依法提出的预防、控制措施，引起甲类传染病传播或者有传播严重危险的行为。
description.en: A crime stipulated in the Criminal Law of China, applicable to acts that violate the provisions of the Law on the Prevention and Treatment of Infectious Diseases by refusing to implement prevention and control measures legally proposed by health and epidemic prevention agencies, causing the spread of Class A infectious diseases or posing a serious risk of transmission.

en: Crime of obstructing border health quarantine

description.zh-cn: 中国《刑法》规定的一项罪名，适用于违反国境卫生检疫规定，引起检疫传染病传播或者有传播严重危险的行为。
description.en: A crime stipulated in the Criminal Law of China, applicable to acts that violate border health quarantine regulations, causing the spread of quarantinable infectious diseases or posing a serious risk of transmission.

description.zh-cn: 由严重急性呼吸系统综合征冠状病毒2（SARS-CoV-2）引发的全球性大流行病。
description.en: A global pandemic caused by Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).

nodes.id: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

zh-cn: 朝鲜民主主义人民共和国

description.zh-cn: 比利时政治家，曾任欧洲理事会主席。
description.en: Belgian politician who served as President of the European Council.

description.zh-cn: 清零政策是为应对2019冠状病毒病疫情而采取的一种防疫策略。
description.en: The zero-COVID policy was an epidemic prevention strategy adopted in response to the COVID-19 pandemic.

description.zh-cn: 中国大陆自疫情初期便开始严格执行清零政策，直至2022年12月放弃该政策。
description.en: Mainland China strictly implemented the zero-COVID policy from the early stages of the pandemic until abandoning it in December 2022.

description.zh-cn: 多次发出指示必须坚持动态清零政策，强调这是由党的性质和宗旨决定的，并亲自指挥、亲自部署。
description.en: Repeatedly instructed to adhere to the dynamic zero-COVID policy, emphasizing it was determined by the nature and purpose of the Party, and personally commanded and deployed it.

description.zh-cn: 在中国各地爆发的反对清零政策的抗议活动，加速了该政策的终结。
description.en: Protests against the zero-COVID policy that erupted across China, hastening the end of the policy.

description.zh-cn: “新十条”的颁布大幅放宽了防疫措施，标志着中国大陆事实上放弃了“动态清零”政策。
description.en: The promulgation of the 'New Ten Measures' significantly relaxed epidemic prevention measures, marking the de facto abandonment of the 'dynamic zero-COVID' policy in mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 公开表示中国的清零政策不可持续。
description.en: Publicly stated that China's zero-COVID policy was unsustainable.

description.zh-cn: 公开表示不认为中国大陆推行的清零政策可以持久进行。
description.en: Publicly stated that he did not believe the zero-COVID policy pursued by mainland China was sustainable.

description.zh-cn: 在白纸运动后接管防疫工作，推动了更为宽松的政策以替代清零，并提出了“新十条”。
description.en: Took over epidemic prevention work after the White Paper Protests, promoted more relaxed policies to replace zero-COVID, and proposed the 'New Ten Measures'.

description.zh-cn: 公开承认变种病毒毒力减弱，表示中国疫情处于“新形势新任务”，提早宣布了清零政策开始松动。
description.en: Publicly acknowledged the weakening virulence of the virus variant, stating that China's epidemic was in a 'new situation with new tasks', thus pre-announcing the loosening of the zero-COVID policy.

relationships.target: 2022年贵州省三都县客车侧翻事故

description.zh-cn: 因疫情防控要求，一辆深夜违规行驶的隔离转运客车发生侧翻，导致27人死亡。
description.en: Due to epidemic control requirements, a quarantine transfer bus operating illegally late at night overturned, resulting in 27 deaths.

description.zh-cn: 据路透社报道，在执行宽松防疫措施后，习近平希望放缓开放，但李强反驳了习近平的要求，并继续推动放宽政策。
description.en: According to Reuters, after implementing relaxed epidemic measures, Xi Jinping wished to slow down the reopening, but Li Qiang rebutted his request and continued to push for policy relaxation.

description.zh-cn: 据媒体人士王向伟透露，时任中共广东省委书记黄坤明曾向习近平反映尽快结束清零政策的紧迫性，间接推动了政策终结。
description.en: According to media personality Wang Xiangwei, Huang Kunming, then Party Secretary of Guangdong, reported to Xi Jinping on the urgency of ending the zero-COVID policy, indirectly contributing to its termination.

description.zh-cn: 在2022年10月下旬召开闭门会议，要求与会官员和专家制定出各种重新开放的路线图，为结束清零政策做准备。
description.en: In late October 2022, convened a closed-door meeting, asking attending officials and experts to formulate various reopening roadmaps in preparation for ending the zero-COVID policy.

description.zh-cn: 习近平在与欧洲理事会主席夏尔·米歇尔的会谈中，承认国内示威源于抗疫三年民众感到沮丧，并承认奥密克戎株致命性远不如德尔塔株。
description.en: During a meeting with European Council President Charles Michel, Xi Jinping acknowledged that domestic protests stemmed from public frustration after three years of pandemic response and admitted the Omicron variant was far less lethal than Delta.

description.zh-cn: 在回应谭德塞对清零政策的批评时，时任外交部发言人赵立坚警告对方“不要发表不负责任的言论”。
description.en: In response to Tedros's criticism of the zero-COVID policy, then-Foreign Ministry spokesman Zhao Lijian warned him 'not to make irresponsible remarks'.

relationships.source: 严重急性呼吸道症候群冠状病毒2型Omicron变异株

description.zh-cn: 奥密克戎变异株的高传染性使得清零政策的执行成本和难度急剧增加，成为许多国家和地区放弃该政策的关键因素。
description.en: The high transmissibility of the Omicron variant dramatically increased the cost and difficulty of implementing the zero-COVID policy, becoming a key factor for many countries and regions to abandon it.

description.zh-cn: 随着防疫政策转向，官方宣布对违反新冠疫情预防、控制措施的行为，不再以妨害传染病防治罪定罪处罚。
description.en: Following the shift in epidemic policy, officials announced that violations of COVID-19 prevention and control measures would no longer be prosecuted as the crime of obstructing the prevention of infectious diseases.

description.zh-cn: 随着防疫政策转向，官方宣布对违反国境卫生检疫规定的行为，不再以妨害国境卫生检疫罪定罪处罚。
description.en: Following the shift in epidemic policy, officials announced that violations of border health quarantine regulations would no longer be prosecuted as the crime of obstructing border health quarantine.

description.zh-cn: 在奥密克戎变异株来袭后，台湾当局认为清零已无可能，改采“与病毒共存”政策。
description.en: After the arrival of the Omicron variant, Taiwanese authorities deemed zero-COVID to be impossible and shifted to a 'living with the virus' policy.

description.zh-cn: 越南在2021年底放弃了清零政策。
description.en: Vietnam abandoned the zero-COVID policy in late 2021.
